desc: Creators of Unique Handcrafted Solid Wood Furniture and Interior Decor, expertly designed and manufactured in the heart of Hampshire. Our range encompasses Coffee tables, Dining tables, Bedside tables, low stools, Desks, Side tables, vanity units, garden tables and garden benches designed and built to exacting standard

layout.text: Timeless design and responsibly sourced timber. Handmade in Hampshire.
